name: Star Chain Arena
description:
Developed for the 2017 Tromsø Game Jam, themed around "connections."

It is 2017, and there is time for Star Chain Arena. 

You are the pilot of a brand new spaceship outfitted with rocket thrusters, plasma lasers, and - most importantly - a set of orbital-scale rubber bands inexorably tying you to your rivals. Now, fling your opponents into oblivion, dodge a terrifying hail of asteroids and hang on for dear life.

Team: Terje André Johansen, Tom Hoevers, Jørgen Lund, Ruben Ohnmacht, Mikko Palo, Joni Liikala, Olli Kerkelä
